text.en: Single embodiment of all the knowledge, love and power
text.en-trans: jamyanglasok sé ché gyal kün gyi

text.en: Of Mañjughoṣa and the rest, all the victors and their heirs,
text.en-trans: khyentsénü sum chik tu düpé zuk

text.en: Chökyi Lodrö, mighty sovereign of Dharma,
To you I pray: inspire me with your blessings!
text.en-trans: solwa deb so dak gyü jingyi lob
